author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: ATTENTION, ATTENTION to all those reporting problems with the quality of voice calls: unfortunately, the same problem happened to me, I received the phone from one of the main mobile operators in Poland. I became interested in the topic on the Internet, mainly on English-speaking forums, practically no one reported similar problems, and even here, on Ceneo, I could come across contradictory opinions. Therefore, I assumed that maybe the branded software was to blame. I decided to test this thesis empirically and started downloading clean software straight from Samsung. Effect? BINGO! call quality is terrible, so I invite you to read the Android forums on how to deal with debranding an Android phone (generally a piece of cake). kind regards! 5 stars because the phone itself is not to blame for anything. However, programmers and testers of our native operators do :)

author: Marcin
content: Overall, it's cool, although the phone was taken to the service center after being taken out of the box to replace a bent frame that was causing the display to peel off. The fault was removed within an hour after ordering the parts, which is a huge plus for the authorized service center Unitra Eltron Serwis in Lublin, as they carry out repairs in this way (they do not keep the equipment in the service center unnecessarily). The phone itself is perfect, exactly what I expected. The only downside is the home button, which you have to press quite hard (the Note3 works much better). Quite a durable battery.

author: zedi
content:
Disadvantages Poor sound from the main speaker - on the back, battery dying quickly. sometimes it heats up - for no reason, no smartStay, which occurs in some cheaper Samsung models and competitors, the overlay can be a bit muddy, in my case there is a problem with the BT module.

Advantages:
Software functionality, cameras, LTE, - on the T-Mobile software it is much better, display - nicely reproduced colors, modest design, back cover, sensitive microphones, ULTRA energy-saving mode - battery, fast Soc - native Exynos via Samsung.

author: Janek
content: The smartphone is fast and stable. Great touch screen. The camera takes great photos. With normal use, the battery lasts for 2 days. All other functions are flawless. I am fully satisfied.

author: maciej
content: Generally, a very good smartphone, in my opinion the housing is better made, mainly in terms of fitting the elements and the frame surrounding the phone. Another advantage is the processor, although it is not as efficient as in its older sister, it is sufficient and does not cause the housing to heat up as much as in the regular S5. The battery life looks good, after turning it on I had 44 percent, then the update to 5.1.1 took place, I played with the settings and checked the functions, so I used it very intensively for 20 hours. I assume it will last two to three days for my needs. The only drawback is that the physical button under the display does not always respond to commands, but I think it is not a defect of the button itself, but a software error that will be corrected during the update.

author: aREk
content: After changing from the old Samsung S-Advance - no comparison. The phone works properly, quickly, and does not hang up. The menu is very intuitive. A big positive. Being used to Samsung prompted me to buy another Samsung - I was not disappointed. I recommend it to everyone who is not entirely sure.

author: Mateusz
content:
The phone is great, it doesn't jam, it starts up quickly, everything is great, the speaker is great.
It's a pity that Samsung didn't leave it with a 4K camera and a fingerprint reader, but I was very disappointed with one thing - the battery discharges quickly, lasting a maximum of 1 day. But I recommend it!

I RECOMMEND

author: Pawel
content: I replaced it with a Galaxy S Plus, which still worked fine, but sometimes it slowed down. S5 neo didn't stop working after loading many apps.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I bought this phone, practically new, 2 weeks old, and everything is as it should be. Nothing jams, conversations are good, I know that many people had problems with this speaker, mine is fine. The battery lasts 2 days with quite a lot of use and spending time on the Internet. The photos are of very good quality, the only drawback is that the back casing vibrates when listening to loud music. In my opinion, the phone is too expensive in stores such as Media Markt, PLN 1,499, better found on Olx. I managed to buy it for PLN 970 and I think that the price is adequate for this smartphone, it is not worth spending more than PLN 1,000 for it. So I can recommend it to anyone at a reasonable price, best regards

author: Maestro
content: Handy aesthetic look! There is no paper manual, which makes it difficult to choose the language and properly install the phone when using the product for the first time! However, everything else is ok!

author: Tomek
content: I was looking for its predecessor, but they don't bring it to stores anymore (strange logic). But to the point, before buying I read reviews and opinions and I was afraid of poor call quality - nothing could be further from the truth. My wife has an S5 and we find that the call quality is the same. I switched from S3 mini, so it's obviously much faster and more efficient. The battery lasts a long time, up to 4 days (mobile data turned off and little used) with LTE yesterday, 40% consumed 6 hours. I miss this infrared light (the TV program remote control app is brilliant). Apart from that, there is nothing to complain about, the equipment is top-shelf. I recommend.

author: Ewa
content: Visually beautiful, I've had it for a short time, but so far everything works 100% without the slightest stutter, despite the large number of applications.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Great phone. He has been using it for 3 years.  He never cut himself once. It never slowed down or slowed down once. Everything works as it should. Purchased on the T-Mobile network. I bought an original neo hybrid Spigen case for it, which gave the phone an individual character.  And during all this time of carrying it in my pocket, the paint from the frame did not wear off - amazing. I haven't had a better phone.   The only downside is Samsung's policy of "aging" the phone with something during updates.  the battery actually lasts one day, but it's a Samsung after all :) and it's never been better. On the plus side, I haven't noticed the battery aging. After such a period of use, it still retains its strength if it were new.

author: Waldek
content: I was looking for an efficient smartphone for everything, at a reasonable price, with a replaceable battery and a memory card slot. My choice is S5 Neo. I guess I won't be disappointed? Regards!

author: Łukasz
content: I have been using the smartphone for 5 months. Optimal size, very good display, good battery life (it lasts me well from morning to evening with intensive use), good sound quality (provided that the set includes the most primitive "fleas", which are worth replacing with something as soon as possible). better), the quality of voice calls after the software update without any reservations (one of the previous updates was defective and prevented normal conversations), Android update to version 6.0 ensured, smoothness of the interface good (scrolling through the menu is a bit slow and it is not

author: Biały
content: The product runs smoothly, does not hang, and applications load quickly. A few goodies make life more pleasant, e.g. a heart rate monitor and water and dust resistance

author: Ania
content: The phone from the series: was nice when it was new. Unfortunately, I was very disappointed with this model in the long run because it has problems with focusing in photos, it often jams and sometimes does strange things such as unlocking or wanting to turn off for unknown reasons. It's a nice phone, but not as a flagship, much more is expected from this level (price). I bought a Samsung on the advice of my friends and I will definitely not choose Samsung as my next phone (I will either go back to Sony or switch to iPhone)

author: Mariusz
content: The Samsung Galaxy S5 Neo that I bought a few days ago works very well, it is fast, the menu is clear and aesthetic. I recommend.

author: madebyme2212
content: I am very pleased with it. The battery lasts 2 days, nice photos. Simple menu. I can recommend this model with clear conscience.

author: Norbert
content: First impression positive. Time will tell whether this feeling will last forever.

author: F
content:
economic evolution of the s5 version... generally a good phone at a good price. on the plus side, a slightly better camera, but only slightly. no infrared remote control. It runs smoothly and does not feel like there is a lack of power in normal use. From this angle, almost like the S6. Weaker components only become visible during games. Of course they are not a problem. However, if someone has the opportunity, it is better to choose the "old" S5.  This will be more advantageous. The menu in S5 is much richer and works just as well. Samsung's policy is also important in the whole matter. .. which phone will get updates to Android M???
If I had to choose again, it would probably be S5... but I don't regret it, S5 neo is just as good!

author: Łukasz
content: Large screen, the phone stays in energy saving mode for 2-3 days, which seems to be a good result.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Everything is beautiful, as befits a flagship (smooth system and super AMOLED) + well-functioning FM radio, one could say it's a great device. Unfortunately, the phone (maybe only my copy) has terrible quality of voice calls. My interlocutors complain that they can barely hear me (as if something was covering the microphone, maybe a microphone defect), but I could hear their voice clearly but hoarsely. Compared to my old Galaxy Core, the call quality is terrible. I don't know if it's because the phone is waterproof, but if so, the sound quality unfortunately suffers greatly.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content:
TO EVERYONE HAVING PROBLEMS WITH POOR CALL QUALITY!!!
The problem is on the operator's side and only affects PLAY! Just TURN OFF DATA TRANSMISSION and the quality changes dramatically!
This is the fault of PLAY, which does nothing about it and it applies to the latest Samsung software. Apparently, the respected operator cannot keep up with the latest Samsung updates and is completely ignoring customers!!!!!

author: mmyy66
content:
If someone offered me this phone again, I wouldn't choose it. 
After only half a year of use, the phone started to freeze, turn off on its own or the screen simply became completely black (neither turned on nor off), twice it deleted all music and photos from the phone.
After restoring factory settings, the condition improved for a few days, and then the same thing happened again. The advantage is that the phone is unbeatable. After a whole day of jamming, I happened to throw it against the wall, and yet the phone is intact and there is not a single scratch on it. (I did not glue tempered glass). It happens that you can take really professional photos (daylight) when you get the hang of it. And the last positive thing is the battery, which, even if you "sit" on the phone all day (if it doesn't stop working for half a day), lasts until late in the evening.

author: Jakub
content: So far it's working great

author: Stanisław
content: As in the technical data description

author: Wonski
content: A great phone at a reasonable price.

author: Łukasz
content: It is true that it is an older model, but it completely meets my expectations. I don't like glass and metal phones, so I consider the plastic back of the phone to be a plus. The battery could be a bit larger considering the phone's parameters, but it charges quickly. Bright screen, full of colors (the screen can only be described in superlatives).

author: sernik
content: Cool, phone no.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I don't hear any problems with the quality of voice calls and my hearing is good. I admit that in general, the phones have poor call quality considering their price and the technical advancement of the entire telephone infrastructure. The sound in the phone is better than my previous phone, the top one by the way, the Sony Ericsson W995, so I have no objections. Apart from that, for this price the phone is really good in every respect. I was most pleasantly surprised by the front camera.

author: Pawel
content: Approx

author: bartek
content: Good

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I have been using it for three years. I don't find any flaws. But - like every smartphone - it absolutely must have a case. I bought one of those armored ones. Not only does the phone feel more secure in my hand, but it also means I won't freeze every time it falls out of my hand. It just so happens that - although the armored case has been protecting the phone for quite a few months - there are no falls - thanks to the protective case, the phone is no longer slippery.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Approx

author: Rysio
content: Approx

author: Elżbieta
content: very good

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I've had this camera for 1.5 years. Basically, as a phone it works flawlessly, but the camera unfortunately takes blurry videos. While the photos are of satisfactory sharpness, the videos are unfortunately not.  He went to the service center twice and replaced what was not the cause of the fault. They said everything was OK, but unfortunately it wasn't.  I don't have the strength to continue proving this sharpness, I'm going to change it to another brand. I "cured" myself from Samsung!!!!!

author: Dawjd
content: Recommendable !!!

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Unfortunately, in my copy the sound quality in the earpiece is also terrible - the voice sounds like it comes from a tunnel. This is especially annoying because the sound was perfect in the older Galaxy S 2. After all, the phone is mainly used for calls and all other advantages pale in comparison to this disadvantage. Additionally, a message appears from time to time about the rear casing not being closed. Maybe someone managed to fix it without taking it to the service center?

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content:
1. Reliable.
2. Fast.
3. Maximum possibilities that iPhone does not have.
4. Great picture.
5. Good sound.
6. Waterproof - I thought it was an unnecessary advantage, I was wrong.
7. Extremely efficient WiFi antenna.
8. Radio (S6, for example, doesn't have one!).
9. Long operation on one charge.

Minuses? The back flap creaks a bit. Fortunately, this sound disappears over time.

author: Krzysztof
content: I decided to buy this phone in Play. It's really great. Only one basic drawback: the interlocutors can't hear me!!! And not only one interlocutor, but practically everyone I talk to... I think that simply faulty phones have found their way to the market and are sold at promotional prices for one zloty... If the manufacturer undertakes to improve the quality of calls, the phone has 5 stars in my opinion ☺☺☺

author: PawelDudzic
content: great phone

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I've had this phone for 2 years and I can say that it is very good.  Great camera, beautiful super AMOLED screen. But the battery is poor... it barely lasts the whole day on 3G and up to an hour of talk time. It never jams, but it's not a speed demon... and the price... is PLN 1,000 too expensive for today's times.  It's better to choose a Chinese one of better quality

author: jolwia
content: May be

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: The phone itself is great, but there is one basic thing that ruins it completely. Call quality. The conversation sounds as if a person were sitting in a barrel and there are some distortions. I bought the phone three weeks ago at Saturn. It was a pity that I only spent PLN 1,500, so I warn others. Other functions are perfect, but as someone wrote here, everything pales in comparison to poor conversations, and that's basically what the phone is for.

author: PawelDudzic
content: Approx

author: daroha
content: Important for me: supports USB OTG - DAC Ifi iDSD nano, battery with normal use 2-3 days.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I use Samsung phones all the time and it is the best model of this company. For relatively little money, I have a phone that outperforms all the A, S6 and S7 series cameras. I really recommend this great phone.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: A truncated version of the old S 5 but... it was deliberately trimmed/no biomets, a non-working fingerprint reader, etc./ in my opinion, the phone is worth considering, good camera, battery life of 2-3 days, generally great for me.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Overall, the phone is very nice... but... I also confirm that the connection (speaker) is "like from an aquarium" - a tragedy; my previous Samsung Galaxy Core is the highest home theater model!

author: Endriu
content: Overall everything is ok, but for me it is too quiet.

author: Łukasz
content: Ideally, it has everything that this phone should contain. Refreshed S5 and I'm satisfied.

author: RiK
content:
Functional phone, intuitive menu, cool photos, fits well in the hand
Overall, no objections

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: the phone is very nice, it's pleasant to hold in your hand, it has a very nice display, the camera takes great photos, my rating is 4.5 out of 5

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: I've had my phone for 3 years. It works like a dream. It has survived many accidents and works like new. I highly recommend this phone.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Opinion after a year of use. At first it was great, the battery lasted all day long. Then, due to frequent charging, the battery lasted a few hours. After purchasing a new original one, it was again without any problems. I don't know what this means. When I use it from 7 a.m. to 3 p.m. I already have 15% and I try to turn off everything in the background and my screen is dimmed. Sometimes it can be brutally pruned, even more recently. I don't even turn on the battery saver mode because then it works. I wiped the phone down to 0 and it didn't make any difference. However, the camera is a big plus

author: Waldi
content: great equipment

author: Daro
content: Phone O.K.

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Hello! Has the noise issue during calls been resolved with the new update? I want to buy this phone, but from what I read it's a big problem. Regards

author: Maciej
content: Great phone. It fully meets my expectations. I recommend

author: Aneta
content: A phone worth recommending. The right quality for the right money. Is great

author: Jakub
content: So far it's working great

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: works great in any situation, good display and battery, easy and nice menu

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: Very good product, the only drawback is the short battery life. Nice photos :)

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: A great phone with a great camera and very good in-ear headphones

author: Użytkownik Ceneo
content: This is my 4th Samsung, smartphones are getting worse and worse. This time the paint fell off the frame, of course it didn't fall off. I called the Samsung service center and he ignored the matter, claiming it was my fault. Be careful with frames where the paint comes off spontaneously.
